db.weapon.basics

Enum WeaponSlots

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<WeaponSlots>
      • db.weapon.basics.WeaponSlots
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<WeaponSlots>

    public enum WeaponSlots
extends java.lang.Enum<WeaponSlots>
    An Enumeration, which values are representing the Slots, a Weapon can be slotted in.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Haeldeus

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      Ammo
      The value, that represents the Ammo Slot.
      HeldInOffhand
      The value, that represents the "Held in Offhand" Slot.
      MainHand
      The value, that represents the Mainhand Slot.
      Offhand
      The value, that represents the Offhand Slot.
      OneHand
      The value, that represents an one-hand Slot.
      Ranged
      The value, that represents the Ranged Slot.
      Shield
      The value, that represents the Shield Slot.
      TwoHand
      The value, that represents a two-hand Slot.

      • Offhand

        public static final WeaponSlots Offhand
        The value, that represents the Offhand Slot. This is mainly used by Swords or Daggers contrasting the HeldInOffhand, which is used by magic Offhands.

        The value, that represents the Shield Slot.
